name: Arm & Hammer Eureka Pet Fresh Odor Eliminating Eureka Vacuum Bags, 6-Pack

reviews.name: Arm & Hammer Eureka Pet Fresh Odor Eliminating Eureka Vacuum Bags, 6-Pack
reviews.reviewText: This is a very reasonably priced product which fits snugly into the vacuum. It has a pleasant smell, which makes vacuuming less of a chore.
reviews.title: Works great, love the pet fresh odor.

reviews.name: Arm & Hammer Eureka Pet Fresh Odor Eliminating Eureka Vacuum Bags, 6-Pack
reviews.reviewText:
They were out of stock on the normal sweeper bags that I buy, so since I have pets I figured why not try this product.
Wow! I was pleasantly surprised at how much I like these. They come with a small packet of powder for each sweeper bag. Basically you add one packet per bag. The smell when vacuuming is very fresh, it is light and not overpowering like so many additives.
I will for sure buy this product again.
reviews.title: Good product

reviews.name: Arm & Hammer Eureka Pet Fresh Odor Eliminating Eureka Vacuum Bags, 6-Pack
reviews.reviewText: Love these. Regular bags just won't due. Please keep these in stock!!
reviews.title: Doggie duty

reviews.name: Arm & Hammer Eureka Pet Fresh Odor Eliminating Eureka Vacuum Bags, 6-Pack
reviews.reviewText: These bags are great. The odor freshener is poured into the vacuum bag. It keeps down pet hair smell.
reviews.title: Love Arm & Hammer Pet Fresh Odor Eliminating bags!

reviews.name: Arm & Hammer Eureka Pet Fresh Odor Eliminating Eureka Vacuum Bags, 6-Pack
reviews.reviewText: I have a dog and a cat and the bags block out the smell and actually smell good. Just double, or even triple check, that the bag has been completely locked into place. I missed a corner one time and what a mess it made when I removed the cover.
reviews.title: Wonderful product
